sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT 'zGroupName' AS GROUP_NAME , 'zXXX9999' AS SYS_MGT_NO , 'zSelectBoxValue' AS SBOX_CODE , 'zSelectBoxText' AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , 'zSelectBoxTextAdd' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR FROM DUAL UNION ALL --------------------------------- /* TCMS_CF_NOTI_TGT - 알림대상업무정보 */ SELECT 'AlarmNotice' AS GROUP_NAME , SYS_MGT_NO AS SYS_MGT_NO , ALM_TYPE_CD AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM101' AND COM_CD = ALM_TYPE_CD ) AS ALM_TYPE_NM , '@1' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR FROM TCMS_CF_NOTI_TGT WHERE ALM_USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------start★ 계좌그룹정보(원화/외화/해외/타행) !!! /* TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT_GRP - 원화계좌그룹정보 */ SELECT 'DmstAcntGroupK' AS GROUP_NAME , SYS_MGT_NO AS SYS_MGT_NO , ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ACNT_GRP_NM_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT_GRP WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND KRW_FOC_DIV = 'K' UNION ALL /* TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT_GRP - 외화계좌그룹정보 */ SELECT 'DmstAcntGroupF' AS GROUP_NAME , SYS_MGT_NO AS SYS_MGT_NO , ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ACNT_GRP_NM_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT_GRP WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND KRW_FOC_DIV = 'F' UNION ALL /* TCMS_CF_OVRS_ACNT_GRP - 해외계좌그룹정보 */ SELECT 'OvrsAcntGroup' AS GROUP_NAME , SYS_MGT_NO AS SYS_MGT_NO , ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ACNT_GRP_NM_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR FROM TCMS_CF_OVRS_ACNT_GRP WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL /* TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT_GRP - 타행원화그룹정보 */ SELECT 'OBAcntGroupK' , SYS_MGT_NO AS SYS_MGT_NO , ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ACNT_GRP_NM_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR FROM TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT_GRP WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND KRW_FOC_DIV = 'K' UNION ALL /* TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT_GRP - 타행외화그룹정보 */ SELECT 'OBAcntGroupF' , SYS_MGT_NO AS SYS_MGT_NO , ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ACNT_GRP_NM_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR FROM TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT_GRP WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND KRW_FOC_DIV = 'F' UNION ALL /* TCMS_CF_CARD_GRP - 카드그룹정보 */ SELECT 'CardGroup' AS GROUP_NAME , SYS_MGT_NO AS SYS_MGT_NO , CARD_GRP_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , '' AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , CARD_GRP_NM || ' ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR FROM TCMS_CF_CARD_GRP WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL /* 국내 원화 계좌 그룹정보 전체(원화/타행) */ SELECT 'DmstAllAcntGroupK' AS GROUP_NAME , SYS_MGT_NO AS SYS_MGT_NO , ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ACNT_GRP_NM_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT_GRP WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND KRW_FOC_DIV = 'K' UNION ALL SELECT 'DmstAllAcntGroupK' AS GROUP_NAME , SYS_MGT_NO AS SYS_MGT_NO , ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ACNT_GRP_NM_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR FROM TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT_GRP WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND KRW_FOC_DIV = 'K' UNION ALL /* 국내 외화 계좌 그룹정보 전체(외화/타행) */ SELECT 'DmstAllAcntGroupF' AS GROUP_NAME , SYS_MGT_NO AS SYS_MGT_NO , ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ACNT_GRP_NM_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT_GRP WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND KRW_FOC_DIV = 'F' UNION ALL SELECT 'DmstAllAcntGroupF' AS GROUP_NAME , SYS_MGT_NO AS SYS_MGT_NO , ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ACNT_GRP_NM_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR FROM TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT_GRP WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND KRW_FOC_DIV = 'F' ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------end ★ 계좌그룹정보(원화/외화/해외/타행) !!! UNION ALL /* TCMS_AP_LINE - 결재선목록 */ SELECT 'ApLine' AS GROUP_NAME , SYS_MGT_NO AS SYS_MGT_NO , APPR_LN_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , APPR_LN_NM AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR FROM TCMS_AP_LINE WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ------------------------------------------------- ) ORDER BY GROUP_NAME, SYS_MGT_NO, SBOX_CODE

SELECT GROUP_NAME , GROUP_DATA , SBOX_CODE , SBOX_NM_KEYS , SBOX_NM_EXPR , SORT_KEYS FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT 'zGroupName' AS GROUP_NAME , 'zGroupData' AS GROUP_DATA , 'zSelectBoxValue' AS SBOX_CODE , 'zSelectBoxTextKeys' AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , 'zSelectBoxTextExpr' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , 'zSelectBoxSortKeys' As SORT_KEYS FROM DUAL UNION ALL ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------start★ 그룹별 계좌정보(원화/외화/해외/타행) !!! /* 로그인사용자의 원화계좌그룹내 계좌권한이 있는 계좌번호 */ SELECT distinct 'DmstAcntByGroupK' AS GROUP_NAME , 'ALL_DATA' AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = C.BANK_CD ) || '|' || C.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ') (@2) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , C.BANK_CD || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT_GRP_DTL A , TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT_GRP B , TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT C WHERE A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO = B.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO = C.ACNT_SEQ_NO AND C.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'K' AND C.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) UNION ALL SELECT 'DmstAcntByGroupK' AS GROUP_NAME , A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = C.BANK_CD ) || '|' || C.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ') (@2) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , C.BANK_CD || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT_GRP_DTL A , TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT_GRP B , TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT C WHERE A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO = B.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO = C.ACNT_SEQ_NO AND C.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'K' AND C.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) /* 로그인사용자의 외화계좌그룹내 계좌권한이 있는 계좌번호 */ UNION ALL SELECT distinct 'DmstAcntByGroupF' AS GROUP_NAME , 'ALL_DATA' AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = C.BANK_CD ) || '|' || C.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ' ' || C.CUR_CD || ') (@2) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , C.BANK_CD || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || C.CUR_CD AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT_GRP_DTL A , TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT_GRP B , TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT C WHERE A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO = B.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO = C.ACNT_SEQ_NO AND C.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'F' AND C.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) UNION ALL SELECT 'DmstAcntByGroupF' AS GROUP_NAME , A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = C.BANK_CD ) || '|' || C.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ' ' || C.CUR_CD || ') (@2) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , C.BANK_CD || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || C.CUR_CD AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT_GRP_DTL A , TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT_GRP B , TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT C WHERE A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO = B.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO = C.ACNT_SEQ_NO AND C.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'F' AND C.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) /* 로그인사용자의 해외계좌그룹내 계좌권한이 있는 계좌번호 */ UNION ALL SELECT distinct 'OvrsAcntByGroup' AS GROUP_NAME , 'ALL_DATA' AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , C.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , C.BANK_NM || ' (' || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ' ' || C.CUR_CD || ') (@1) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , C.BANK_NM || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || C.CUR_CD AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_OVRS_ACNT_GRP_DTL A , TCMS_CF_OVRS_ACNT_GRP B , TCMS_CF_OVRS_ACNT C WHERE A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO = B.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO = C.ACNT_SEQ_NO AND C.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_OVRS_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) UNION ALL SELECT 'OvrsAcntByGroup' AS GROUP_NAME , A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , C.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , C.BANK_NM || ' (' || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ' ' || C.CUR_CD || ') (@1) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , C.BANK_NM || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || C.CUR_CD AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_OVRS_ACNT_GRP_DTL A , TCMS_CF_OVRS_ACNT_GRP B , TCMS_CF_OVRS_ACNT C WHERE A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO = B.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO = C.ACNT_SEQ_NO AND C.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_OVRS_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) UNION ALL /* 로그인사용자의 타행원화계좌그룹내 계좌권한이 있는 계좌번호 */ SELECT distinct 'OBAcntByGroupK' AS GROUP_NAME , 'ALL_DATA' AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = C.BANK_CD ) || '|' || C.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ') (@2) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , C.BANK_CD || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT_GRP_DTL A , TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT_GRP B , TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT C WHERE A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO = B.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO = C.ACNT_SEQ_NO AND C.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'K' AND C.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_SC_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) UNION ALL SELECT 'OBAcntByGroupK' AS GROUP_NAME , A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = C.BANK_CD ) || '|' || C.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ') (@2) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , C.BANK_CD || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT_GRP_DTL A , TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT_GRP B , TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT C WHERE A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO = B.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO = C.ACNT_SEQ_NO AND C.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'K' AND C.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_SC_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) /* 로그인사용자의 타행외화계좌그룹내 계좌권한이 있는 계좌번호 */ UNION ALL SELECT distinct 'OBAcntByGroupF' AS GROUP_NAME , 'ALL_DATA' AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = C.BANK_CD ) || '|' || C.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ' ' || C.CUR_CD || ') (@2) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , C.BANK_CD || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || C.CUR_CD AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT_GRP_DTL A , TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT_GRP B , TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT C WHERE A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO = B.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO = C.ACNT_SEQ_NO AND C.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'F' AND C.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_SC_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) UNION ALL SELECT 'OBAcntByGroupF' AS GROUP_NAME , A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = C.BANK_CD ) || '|' || C.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ' ' || C.CUR_CD || ') (@2) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , C.BANK_CD || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || C.CUR_CD AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT_GRP_DTL A , TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT_GRP B , TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT C WHERE A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO = B.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO = C.ACNT_SEQ_NO AND C.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'F' AND C.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_SC_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) UNION ALL SELECT distinct 'DmstAllAcntByGroupK' AS GROUP_NAME , 'ALL_DATA' AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = C.BANK_CD ) || '|' || C.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ') (@2) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , C.BANK_CD || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT_GRP_DTL A , TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT_GRP B , TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT C WHERE A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO = B.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO = C.ACNT_SEQ_NO AND C.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'K' AND C.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) UNION ALL SELECT distinct 'DmstAllAcntByGroupK' AS GROUP_NAME , 'ALL_DATA' AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = C.BANK_CD ) || '|' || C.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ') (@2) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , C.BANK_CD || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT_GRP_DTL A , TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT_GRP B , TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT C WHERE A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO = B.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO = C.ACNT_SEQ_NO AND C.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'K' AND C.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_SC_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) UNION ALL SELECT 'DmstAllAcntByGroupK' AS GROUP_NAME , A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = C.BANK_CD ) || '|' || C.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ') (@2) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , C.BANK_CD || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT_GRP_DTL A , TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT_GRP B , TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT C WHERE A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO = B.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO = C.ACNT_SEQ_NO AND C.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'K' AND C.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) UNION ALL SELECT 'DmstAllAcntByGroupK' AS GROUP_NAME , A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = C.BANK_CD ) || '|' || C.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ') (@2) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , C.BANK_CD || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT_GRP_DTL A , TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT_GRP B , TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT C WHERE A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO = B.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO = C.ACNT_SEQ_NO AND C.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'K' AND C.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_SC_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) /* 로그인사용자의 외화계좌그룹내 계좌권한이 있는 계좌번호 */ UNION ALL SELECT distinct 'DmstAllAcntByGroupF' AS GROUP_NAME , 'ALL_DATA' AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = C.BANK_CD ) || '|' || C.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ' ' || C.CUR_CD || ') (@2) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , C.BANK_CD || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || C.CUR_CD AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT_GRP_DTL A , TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT_GRP B , TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT C WHERE A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO = B.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO = C.ACNT_SEQ_NO AND C.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'F' AND C.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) UNION ALL SELECT distinct 'DmstAllAcntByGroupF' AS GROUP_NAME , 'ALL_DATA' AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = C.BANK_CD ) || '|' || C.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ' ' || C.CUR_CD || ') (@2) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , C.BANK_CD || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || C.CUR_CD AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT_GRP_DTL A , TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT_GRP B , TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT C WHERE A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO = B.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO = C.ACNT_SEQ_NO AND C.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'F' AND C.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_SC_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) UNION ALL SELECT 'DmstAllAcntByGroupF' AS GROUP_NAME , A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = C.BANK_CD ) || '|' || C.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ' ' || C.CUR_CD || ') (@2) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , C.BANK_CD || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || C.CUR_CD AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT_GRP_DTL A , TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT_GRP B , TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT C WHERE A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO = B.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO = C.ACNT_SEQ_NO AND C.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'F' AND C.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) UNION ALL SELECT 'DmstAllAcntByGroupF' AS GROUP_NAME , A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = C.BANK_CD ) || '|' || C.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ' ' || C.CUR_CD || ') (@2) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , C.BANK_CD || C.SMARK_ACNT_NO || C.CUR_CD AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT_GRP_DTL A , TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT_GRP B , TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT C WHERE A.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO = B.ACNT_GRP_SEQ_NO AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO = C.ACNT_SEQ_NO AND C.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'F' AND C.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_SC_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# )
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------end★ 그룹별 계좌정보(원화/외화/해외/타행) !!! UNION ALL /* 로그인사용자의 계좌권한이 있는 은행코드 */ SELECT 'BankByUser' AS GROUP_NAME , 'NONE' AS GROUP_DATA , A.BANK_CD AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = A.BANK_CD ) AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , A.BANK_CD AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT A WHERE A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) GROUP BY A.BANK_CD UNION ALL --------------------------------- /* 로그인사용자의 계좌권한이 있는 계좌번호 */ SELECT 'AcntByUser' AS GROUP_NAME , A.BIZ_SEQ_NO AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = A.BANK_CD ) || '|' || A.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ') (@2) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , A.BANK_CD || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT A WHERE A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL ---------------------------------Yyy*** /* 로그인사용자의 계좌권한이 있는 실시간이체 출금계좌번호(국내) */ SELECT 'AcntByUserOut' AS GROUP_NAME , 'GROUP_DATA' AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT SMARK_CRPN_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_CRPN WHERE CRPN_SEQ_NO = B.CRPN_SEQ_NO ) || '|' || B.SMARK_BIZ_NM || '|' || ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = A.BANK_CD ) || '|' || A.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '[@1/@2]@3:' || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ' (@4) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , A.BANK_CD || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT A , TCMS_CF_DMST_BIZR B WHERE A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.BIZ_SEQ_NO = B.BIZ_SEQ_NO AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.OUT_ACNT_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL ---------------------------------Yyy*** /* 로그인사용자의 계좌권한이 있는 실시간이체 출금계좌번호(원화) */ SELECT 'KrwAcntByUserOut' AS GROUP_NAME , 'GROUP_DATA' AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT SMARK_CRPN_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_CRPN WHERE CRPN_SEQ_NO = B.CRPN_SEQ_NO ) || '|' || B.SMARK_BIZ_NM_KEY || '|' || ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = A.BANK_CD ) || '|' || A.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '[@1/@2]@3:' || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ' (@4) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , A.BANK_CD || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT A , TCMS_CF_DMST_BIZR B WHERE A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.BIZ_SEQ_NO = B.BIZ_SEQ_NO AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.OUT_ACNT_YN = 'Y' AND A.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'K' AND A.BANK_CD = (SELECT MAIN_BANK_CD FROM TCMS_CF_SYS WHERE SYS_MGT_NO = #sys_mgt_no#) UNION ALL ---------------------------------Yyy*** /* 로그인사용자의 계좌권한이 있는 실시간이체 출금계좌번호(원화)_개별지급(다건)용 */ SELECT 'KrwAcntByUserOutFor42' AS GROUP_NAME , 'GROUP_DATA' AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = A.BANK_CD ) AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '[' || ( SELECT COM_CD_NM FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = A.BANK_CD ) || ']' || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , A.ACNT_NO AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT A , TCMS_CF_DMST_BIZR B WHERE A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.BIZ_SEQ_NO = B.BIZ_SEQ_NO AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.OUT_ACNT_YN = 'Y' AND A.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'K' AND A.BANK_CD = (SELECT MAIN_BANK_CD FROM TCMS_CF_SYS WHERE SYS_MGT_NO = #sys_mgt_no#) UNION ALL ---------------------------------Yyy*** /* 로그인사용자의 계좌권한이 있는 실시간이체 출금계좌번호(외화) */ SELECT 'FocAcntByUserOut' AS GROUP_NAME , 'GROUP_DATA' AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT SMARK_CRPN_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_CRPN WHERE CRPN_SEQ_NO = B.CRPN_SEQ_NO ) || '|' || B.SMARK_BIZ_NM_KEY || '|' || ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = A.BANK_CD ) || '|' || A.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '[@1/@2]@3:' || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ' ' || A.CUR_CD || ' (@4) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , A.BANK_CD || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT A , TCMS_CF_DMST_BIZR B WHERE A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.BIZ_SEQ_NO = B.BIZ_SEQ_NO AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.OUT_ACNT_YN = 'Y' AND A.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'F' AND A.BANK_CD = (SELECT MAIN_BANK_CD FROM TCMS_CF_SYS WHERE SYS_MGT_NO = #sys_mgt_no#) UNION ALL ---------------------------------Yyy*** /* 로그인사용자의 계좌권한이 있는 대량이체출금계좌번호 */ SELECT 'AcntByUserBigOut' AS GROUP_NAME , 'GROUP_DATA' AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT SMARK_CRPN_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_CRPN WHERE CRPN_SEQ_NO = B.CRPN_SEQ_NO ) || '|' || B.SMARK_BIZ_NM_KEY || '|' || ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = A.BANK_CD ) || '|' || A.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '[@1/@2]@3:' || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ' (@4) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , A.BANK_CD || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT A , TCMS_CF_DMST_BIZR B WHERE A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.BIZ_SEQ_NO = B.BIZ_SEQ_NO AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.BIG_OUT_ACNT_YN = 'Y' AND A.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'K' AND A.BANK_CD = (SELECT MAIN_BANK_CD FROM TCMS_CF_SYS WHERE SYS_MGT_NO = #sys_mgt_no#) UNION ALL ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------start★ 법인/사업장별 계좌정보(원화/외화/해외/타행) !!! /* 로그인사용자의 사업자권한이 있는 원화계좌번호 */ SELECT 'DmstAcntByBizrK' AS GROUP_NAME , A.BIZ_SEQ_NO AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = A.BANK_CD ) || '|' || A.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ') (@2) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , A.BANK_CD || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT A WHERE A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.BIZ_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT IA.BIZ_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_BIZR IA , TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_BIZR IB WHERE IA.BIZ_SEQ_NO = IB.BIZ_SEQ_NO AND IB.USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'K' AND A.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL /* 로그인사용자의 사업자권한이 있는 외화계좌번호 */ SELECT 'DmstAcntByBizrF' AS GROUP_NAME , A.BIZ_SEQ_NO AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = A.BANK_CD ) || '|' || A.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ' ' || A.CUR_CD || ') (@2) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , A.BANK_CD || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO || A.CUR_CD AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT A WHERE A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.BIZ_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT IA.BIZ_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_BIZR IA , TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_BIZR IB WHERE IA.BIZ_SEQ_NO = IB.BIZ_SEQ_NO AND IB.USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'F' AND A.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL /* 로그인사용자의 사업자권한이 있는 해외계좌번호 */ SELECT 'OvrsAcntByBizr' AS GROUP_NAME , A.BIZ_SEQ_NO AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , A.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , A.BANK_NM || ' (' || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ' ' || A.CUR_CD || ') (@1) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , A.BANK_NM || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO || A.CUR_CD AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_OVRS_ACNT A WHERE A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_OVRS_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.BIZ_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT IA.BIZ_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_OVRS_BIZR IA , TCMS_CF_AUTH_OVRS_BIZR IB WHERE IA.BIZ_SEQ_NO = IB.BIZ_SEQ_NO AND IB.USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL /* 로그인사용자의 사업자권한이 있는 타행원화계좌번호 */ SELECT 'OBAcntByBizrK' AS GROUP_NAME , A.BIZ_SEQ_NO AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = A.BANK_CD ) || '|' || A.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ') (@2) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , A.BANK_CD || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT A WHERE A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_SC_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.BIZ_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT IA.BIZ_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_BIZR IA , TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_BIZR IB WHERE IA.BIZ_SEQ_NO = IB.BIZ_SEQ_NO AND IB.USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'K' AND A.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL /* 로그인사용자의 사업자권한이 있는 타행외화계좌번호 */ SELECT 'OBAcntByBizrF' AS GROUP_NAME , A.BIZ_SEQ_NO AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = A.BANK_CD ) || '|' || A.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ' ' || A.CUR_CD || ') (@2) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , A.BANK_CD || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO || A.CUR_CD AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT A WHERE A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_SC_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.BIZ_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT IA.BIZ_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_BIZR IA , TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_BIZR IB WHERE IA.BIZ_SEQ_NO = IB.BIZ_SEQ_NO AND IB.USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'F' AND A.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y'
UNION ALL /* 로그인사용자의 사업자권한이 있는 원화(국내/타행)계좌번호 */ SELECT 'DmstAllAcntByBizrK' AS GROUP_NAME , A.BIZ_SEQ_NO AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = A.BANK_CD ) || '|' || A.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ') (@2) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , A.BANK_CD || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT A WHERE A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.BIZ_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT IA.BIZ_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_BIZR IA , TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_BIZR IB WHERE IA.BIZ_SEQ_NO = IB.BIZ_SEQ_NO AND IB.USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'K' AND A.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT 'DmstAllAcntByBizrK' AS GROUP_NAME , A.BIZ_SEQ_NO AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = A.BANK_CD ) || '|' || A.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ') (@2) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , A.BANK_CD || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT A WHERE A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_SC_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.BIZ_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT IA.BIZ_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_BIZR IA , TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_BIZR IB WHERE IA.BIZ_SEQ_NO = IB.BIZ_SEQ_NO AND IB.USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'K' AND A.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL /* 로그인사용자의 사업자권한이 있는 외화(국내/타행)계좌번호 */ SELECT 'DmstAllAcntByBizrF' AS GROUP_NAME , A.BIZ_SEQ_NO AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = A.BANK_CD ) || '|' || A.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ' ' || A.CUR_CD || ') (@2) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , A.BANK_CD || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO || A.CUR_CD AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT A WHERE A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.BIZ_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT IA.BIZ_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_BIZR IA , TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_BIZR IB WHERE IA.BIZ_SEQ_NO = IB.BIZ_SEQ_NO AND IB.USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'F' AND A.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT 'DmstAllAcntByBizrF' AS GROUP_NAME , A.BIZ_SEQ_NO AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = A.BANK_CD ) || '|' || A.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ' ' || A.CUR_CD || ') (@2) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , A.BANK_CD || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO || A.CUR_CD AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_SC_ACNT A WHERE A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_SC_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.BIZ_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT IA.BIZ_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_BIZR IA , TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_BIZR IB WHERE IA.BIZ_SEQ_NO = IB.BIZ_SEQ_NO AND IB.USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'F' AND A.NEW_ISS_YN = 'N' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------end★ 법인/사업장별 계좌정보(원화/외화/해외/타행) !!!
UNION ALL
/* 로그인사용자의 사업자권한이 있는 카드번호 */ SELECT 'CardByBizr' AS GROUP_NAME , A.BIZ_SEQ_NO AS GROUP_DATA , A.CARD_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM001' AND COM_CD = A.CARD_CO_CD ) AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || A.SMARK_CARD_NO || ') ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , ( SELECT COM_CD FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM001' AND COM_CD = A.CARD_CO_CD ) || A.SMARK_CARD_NO AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_CARD A WHERE A.CARD_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT CARD_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_CARD WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.BIZ_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT IA.BIZ_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_BIZR IA , TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_BIZR IB WHERE IA.BIZ_SEQ_NO = IB.BIZ_SEQ_NO AND IB.USER_ID = #user_id# )
UNION ALL
SELECT 'CardGroupByBizr' AS GROUP_NAME ,'ALL_DATA' AS GROUP_DATA ,CARD_GRP_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE ,'' AS SBOX_NM_KEYS ,CARD_GRP_NM || ' ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR ,CARD_GRP_NM AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_CARD_GRP WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND SYS_MGT_NO = #sys_mgt_no# AND CRT_ID IN (SELECT USER_ID FROM TCMS_CF_USER WHERE BIZ_SEQ_NO = (SELECT BIZ_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_USER WHERE USER_ID = #user_id#) )
UNION ALL
/* 로그인사용자의 */ /* 카드그룹내 카드권한이 있는 카드번호 */ SELECT distinct 'CardByGroup' AS GROUP_NAME , 'ALL_DATA' AS GROUP_DATA , C.CARD_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM001' AND COM_CD = C.CARD_CO_CD ) AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || C.SMARK_CARD_NO || ') ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , ( SELECT COM_CD FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM001' AND COM_CD = C.CARD_CO_CD ) || C.SMARK_CARD_NO AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_CARD_GRP_DTL A , TCMS_CF_CARD_GRP B , TCMS_CF_CARD C WHERE A.CARD_GRP_SEQ_NO = B.CARD_GRP_SEQ_NO AND A.CARD_SEQ_NO = C.CARD_SEQ_NO AND A.CARD_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT CARD_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_CARD WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# )
UNION ALL
SELECT 'CardByGroup' AS GROUP_NAME , A.CARD_GRP_SEQ_NO AS GROUP_DATA , A.CARD_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM001' AND COM_CD = C.CARD_CO_CD ) AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1 (' || C.SMARK_CARD_NO || ') ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , ( SELECT COM_CD FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM001' AND COM_CD = C.CARD_CO_CD ) || C.SMARK_CARD_NO AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_CARD_GRP_DTL A , TCMS_CF_CARD_GRP B , TCMS_CF_CARD C WHERE A.CARD_GRP_SEQ_NO = B.CARD_GRP_SEQ_NO AND A.CARD_SEQ_NO = C.CARD_SEQ_NO AND A.CARD_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT CARD_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_CARD WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) ) ORDER BY GROUP_NAME, SORT_KEYS ) UNION ALL /* ================================================================= */ SELECT GROUP_NAME , GROUP_DATA , SBOX_CODE , SBOX_NM_KEYS , SBOX_NM_EXPR , SORT_KEYS FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT 'AcntByUserMyOut' AS GROUP_NAME , 'GROUP_DATA0' AS GROUP_DATA , B.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT SMARK_CRPN_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_CRPN WHERE CRPN_SEQ_NO = C.CRPN_SEQ_NO ) || '|' || C.SMARK_BIZ_NM_KEY || '|' || ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = B.BANK_CD ) || '|' || B.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '[@1/@2]@3:' || B.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ' (@4) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , B.BANK_CD || B.SMARK_ACNT_NO AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_MY_DMST_ACNT A , TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT B , TCMS_CF_DMST_BIZR C WHERE A.ACNT_SEQ_NO = B.ACNT_SEQ_NO AND B.BIZ_SEQ_NO = C.BIZ_SEQ_NO AND A.RW_DIV = '1' AND A.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'K' AND A.USER_ID = #user_id# AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) UNION ALL SELECT 'AcntByUserMyOut' AS GROUP_NAME , 'GROUP_DATA1' AS GROUP_DATA , 'X' AS SBOX_CODE , '--------------------' AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '@1' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , 'X' AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_MY_DMST_ACNT WHERE RW_DIV = '1' AND KRW_FOC_DIV = 'K' AND USER_ID = #user_id# AND ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) GROUP BY USER_ID UNION ALL SELECT 'AcntByUserMyOut' AS GROUP_NAME , 'GROUP_DATA2' AS GROUP_DATA , A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AS SBOX_CODE , ( SELECT SMARK_CRPN_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_CRPN WHERE CRPN_SEQ_NO = B.CRPN_SEQ_NO ) || '|' || B.SMARK_BIZ_NM_KEY || '|' || ( SELECT COM_CD_NM_KEY FROM TCMS_CF_COM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'COM000' AND COM_CD = A.BANK_CD ) || '|' || A.ACNT_USAG_KEY AS SBOX_NM_KEYS , '[@1/@2]@3:' || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO || ' (@4) ' AS SBOX_NM_EXPR , A.BANK_CD || A.SMARK_ACNT_NO AS SORT_KEYS FROM TCMS_CF_DMST_ACNT A , TCMS_CF_DMST_BIZR B WHERE A.BIZ_SEQ_NO = B.BIZ_SEQ_NO AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_CF_AUTH_DMST_ACNT WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# ) AND A.ACNT_SEQ_NO NOT IN ( SELECT ACNT_SEQ_NO FROM TCMS_MY_DMST_ACNT WHERE ACNT_SEQ_NO = A.ACNT_SEQ_NO AND USER_ID = #user_id# AND RW_DIV = '1' AND KRW_FOC_DIV = 'K' ) AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.OUT_ACNT_YN = 'Y' AND A.KRW_FOC_DIV = 'K' ) ORDER BY GROUP_NAME, SORT_KEYS )
